RT @dcurtis: Twitter Bootstrap is the perfect framework for building the Twitter Bootstrap documentation.
@nzmrmn I would really like your perspective on why ongoing divisiveness is preferable to cooling hot heads, talking with each other?
RT @OLAASM: @joshwolf You have every right to say libelous, irresponsible, and racist things. Just not using sites that piggyback on the ...
@waynesmom I watched the people behind that proposal come out to #GA, stand behind their words, say their part. Did not see @oomedia do same
@nzmrmn This whole argument, between oomedia/omar, now between you and I, I fear is exactly what SOMEONE wanted, and we are obeying script.
@nzmrmn That hyper-loaded language is not a way to productively grow/discuss as a movement, and that is what worries me. @waynesmom
@waynesmom imho, removing whole committee most even-handed way of remedying divisive argument rather than targeting individuals in witchhunt
@waynesmom I would have preferred to vote on a proposal to denounce the article but as @OccupiedOakTrib said, proposal not about individuals
RT @enjalot: wake and quake this morning. 1 mile from the epicenter and I got shook out of bed
@waynesmom It seems to me that arguing about "this side is a terrorist" "this is side is silencing the other side" - not productive.
@waynesmom My problem is that I don't see them as silenced- we all have blogs, we all can participate, and they (like us) are not stopping.
@nzmrmn @geekeasy I understand that there are two sides- sucks that yours couldn't be addressed because terrorist allegations sullied water
@geekeasy That sucks because I think of Occupy Oakland as my neighbors & community where I live, not really something I can "walk out" of.
@nzmrmn @waynesmom If this is where a lot of the negativity from @oomedia is coming from I'd love to understand better of how you see it?
@nzmrmn @geekeasy It says don't post potentially incriminating content- something that I've taken pains not to do already.
@geekeasy I appreciate your work, and @nzmrmn - but I am far more concerned with the division of our movement than the abuse of individuals.
@nzmrmn @waynesmom As a photographer/tweeter/documenter none of what was said in that solidarity proposal would cause me to act differently.
@nzmrmn @waynesmom That proposal was presented to me as having been on the table BEFORE the article about Omar went up, different issue?
@waynesmom @nzmrmn @oomedia This whole drama/debate shows that the relationship between OOMedia and OccupyOakland at large was not right.
@waynesmom @nzmrmn All the proposal did, from my (& my forum group's) understanding  was to no longer allow OO Media to be voice of OO.
@waynesmom @nzmrmn The dichotomy of GA as opressor and OOMedia as victim is false, perpetuated by OOMedia. Proposal deprived no one's voice.
@nzmrmn @geekeasy Even if you might be right, even if you are coming from the right place, the way you are going about things looks foolish.
@nzmrmn @geekeasy I have no horse in this race, but your attitudes on Twitter are much more divisive than what I see from @hyphy_republic
#occupyoakland I normally try to stay out of shit, but this seperating/arguing is EXACTLY WHAT THEY (gov, opposition) WANT to see us doing.
Enjoyed my first experiment with Tabletop.js, lots of power here. This a choropleth powered by a google spreadsheet http://t.co/nXFOQXmE
@OWster_org If any one party's goal was to divide or distract our #GA for over a week, they were radically successful. Talk about #teardrop.
#OccupyOakland #GA is taking forever. Goodness gracious.

Yay, Jalape√±o Calzone coming my way for dinner.
Oh, high road. You are so comfortable.
My room smells good, like perfumed cleaning fluid. It's not my doing though- haven't used any. This worries me a little.
Sweeping my room.
I should really, like, work on my website.

Watching Blowup because I heard Kern mention it in VBS.TV
Stranger Than Fiction is a wonderful wonderful wonderful movie. Definitely in my top 10.
At 9:00 I am going to do a thorough room cleaning. Really. I swear. I will.
I like to tell stories because people like stories, and if people like my stories they like me, and if people like me I like me.
